title: Reputation Born from a Misunderstanding
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Yoshiko-chaaan, I want to ask you for a favor.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane, okay. What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>You see, I want you to be a guest on my next livestream. Because when you’re there, it seems that every livestream gets really exciting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Heh, Yohane has heard the voices of the little demons firsthand way ahead of everyone else, so it’s only natural.... Sure, I’ll be there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yaaay! Thank you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>So, what are we going to do on the stream?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Umm, I was thinking of doing a let’s play.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh, a let’s play....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah. You played a horror game with Hanayo-chan the other day, right? Your scream, the way you move, and how you get people riled up were truly amazing, so I also wanted to play a horror game with you, Yoshiko-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>T-, that’s not really an attempt to get people riled up.... and give me a break already with the horror games---!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
